description:
When rivals Kali Cooper and Ashtyn Evans team up to uncover the identity of an anonymous gossip account, the mystery takes an unexpected turn when their partnership blossoms into a budding romance. 

Standalone in the Sunset Scandals 

***

Kali Cooper and Ashtyn Evans have nothing in common. Their mutual hatred is the only thing they agree on. But when Kali and Ashtyn become the targets of a Sunset Scandals resurgence that turns them into the laughingstock of school, the girls face an impossible choice: team up to stop Sunset Scandals, or risk further social annihilation.

As the unlikely duo attempt to save their reputations, their hatred slowly turns into a tepid friendship. But every twist and turn of the mystery brings the girls even closer together, sparking chemistry that's becoming impossible to ignore. 

Will Kali and Ashtyn give into the heat between them, or will Sunset Scandals decide that finding Happy Ever After isn't part of the plan?
